definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

pinyin: jing1 dian3 dong4 li4 xi4 tong3

sentences.english: Can you recommend any perfect chocolates?
sentences.chinese: 你能推薦一些經典的巧克力嗎？

sentences.english: One of the classic comedies of Sichuanese comedian, Li Boqing…
sentences.chinese: 四川話評書人李伯清的經典散打評書之一。

sentences.english: Cunard Line continues to provide the classy elegance we are accustomed to seeing from them.
sentences.chinese: 丘納德線繼續提供經典優雅我們習慣於看到他們。

sentences.english: Of course, there are many other recommended classic song.
sentences.chinese: 當然，其他也有不少值得推薦的經典之曲。

sentences.english: In fact, this tour is the classic red and white hand-shooting game machine small bees.
sentences.chinese: 其實這款手遊就是經典紅白機射擊遊戲小蜜蜂。

sentences.english: Falling in love is the paradigmatic example of  an involuntary  life-affecting desire.
sentences.chinese: 墜入愛河是一個慾望不由自主影響人生的經典案例。

sentences.english: "Lo River Map" is one of his classic masterpiece.
sentences.chinese: 《洛神賦圖》即爲他的經典代表作之一。

sentences.english: Classic German-style flavor, a perfect cherry and strawberry cake.
sentences.chinese: 徳式傳統經典風味，酒釀櫻桃的完美呈現。

sentences.english: DJ is putting on his usual disc.
sentences.chinese: 唱片師又放上一碟經典。

sentences.english: Happy baccarat is a classic casino game.
sentences.chinese: 開心百家樂是經典賭場遊戲。

sentences.english: Psychologists could also identify the key ages that best allow for the memorization of classical texts.
sentences.chinese: 心理學家也可以幫助確定最適於記憶經典文本的年齡。

sentences.english: The first-order cancellation is one kind of classical idea for the purpose of canceling stationary target cancellation.
sentences.chinese: 一次相消技術是一種經典的固定點目標對消方法。

sentences.english: Then, it discusses the typification of the image of stone.
sentences.chinese: 最後進行石頭意象經典化的討論。

sentences.english: The comparisons of the results at the quantum level with those in classical theories are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 將量子情況下的結果與經典結果作了對比。

sentences.english: Mrs Dalloways is one of the typical works on stream of consciousness by Virginia Woolf.
sentences.chinese: 《達羅衛夫人》是伍爾夫意識流小說的經典之作。

sentences.english: Shot was a free kick of 60 meters away.
sentences.chinese: 奇拉維特罰球的經典之作是60。

definition: to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
inspiration/insight/a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor
to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
